hillburrow/oldSheriffMurder.title: Sherlock Pones and the dead Sheriff
hillburrow/oldSheriffMurder.description: At Hillburrow, the current officer of the law, Itchy Powder, wants you to help her elucidate the murder of the previous Sheriff, Scratchy Lead.
hillburrow/oldSheriffMurder.desc-autopsy: Itchy Powder suggested you check with the town's doctor who performed Scratchy Lead's autopsy.
